title: 56 Make Up For Ever Eyeshadow Photos, Swatches, Mini Reviews
text:
by Rati   
Hi Everyone, ðŸ™‚ I know that Iâ€™d take ages to review all these eyeshadows so I am doing a quick mini reviews on all these in terms of swatches, pigmentation texture etc. Hope this would be helpful to some of you who plan to include MUFE Eyeshadows in their collection. ðŸ™‚ I absolutely love their eyeshadows. Just not a fan of their Satin finish eyeshadows. Rest all the finishes are exceptional and beyond gorgeous.These eyeshadows are for USD 20 / INR 1300 approx each. The pans are much bigger than your regular eyeshadow pans esp MAC. In India Make Up For Ever is available in Sephora. 
The Make Up For Ever Eyeshadows are Numbered according to their finish 
ME : Metallic
